Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit or Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better. AMD Dual core or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.3+ compatible. (Almost anything from 2009 or newer.)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High quality speakers or headphones are recommended. Apple "Dirty Buds" will deliver a sub-par experience.
  • Additional Notes: Imma be honest... if you can't run steam, you can't run this. If you can run steam, this work just fine.
